item.title: 【Introductions & Farewells】Suspending requests was the only thing I asked for a while
item.description:
It's absurd and disrespectful that people don't read it. *I feel in perfect condition* Everything is wonderful. My grandmother will be buried tomorrow. Learn to respect your friends in all ways, on the internet, in person. Ignore other people's feelings.. act idiot and when you need something, don't wait for kindness.

My life will change, has already started, and...
I can't cry.


Thank u.
Thank u.
Thank u.
item.author: SCANDAL
